00021     void UserEventAction::BeginOfEventAction(const G4Event* anEvent) {
00022 
00023         // Clear the global track map.
00024         UserTrackingAction::getUserTrackingAction()->getTrackMap()->clear();
00025 
00026         // Install custom trajectory container for the event.
00027         //G4EventManager::GetEventManager()->GetNonconstCurrentEvent()->SetTrajectoryContainer(new TrajectoryContainer);
00028 
00029         // G4Random::showEngineStatus();
00030         // G4Random::saveEngineStatus();
00031         // G4Random::getTheEngine();
00032         if (PrimaryGeneratorMessenger::useRootSeed())
00033             G4Random::restoreEngineStatus("tmpEvent.rndm"); // this line will be needed to read in a set of seeds
00034 
00035             // Activate user plugins.
00036         pluginManager_->beginEvent(anEvent);
00037     }
00038 
00039     void UserEventAction::EndOfEventAction(const G4Event* anEvent) {
00040         pluginManager_->endEvent(anEvent);
00041     }
